text: How do I re.search or re.match on a whole file without reading it all into memory?

I want to be able to run a regular expression on an entire file, but I'd like to be able to not have to read the whole file into memory at once as I may be working with rather large files in the future.
Is there a way to do this?
Clarification: I cannot read line-by-line because it can span multiple lines.
